responses.response: Remember why you started. You can do all things through Christ who strengthens you.

scripture.text: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.

responses.response: Grace is new every morning. His mercies never fail.

scripture.text: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning; great is your faithfulness.

responses.response: Cast your cares on Him. He cares for you.

scripture.text: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

responses.response: You are never alone. God is with you always.

scripture.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.

responses.response: Do not fear, for I am with you. Be strong and courageous.

scripture.text: Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.

responses.response: Come to me, all who are weary, and I will give you rest.

scripture.text: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

responses.response: Be slow to anger. A gentle answer turns away wrath.

scripture.text: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.

responses.response: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted. There is hope in Him.

scripture.text: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.

responses.response: Trust in the Lord with all your heart. Lean not on your own understanding.

scripture.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

responses.response: Give thanks in all circumstances. This is God's will for you.

scripture.text: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God's will for you in Christ Jesus.

responses.response: The peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your heart.

scripture.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

responses.response: Those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength.

scripture.text: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.

responses.response: God's love for you is unfailing and everlasting.

scripture.text: I have loved you with an everlasting love; I have drawn you with unfailing kindness.

responses.response: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us.

scripture.text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

responses.response: For I know the plans I have for you, plans to prosper you and not to harm you.

scripture.text: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

responses.response: You were created for a purpose. God has a plan for your life.

scripture.text: For we are God's handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

responses.response: In all these things we are more than conquerors through Him who loved us.

scripture.text: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

responses.response: Wait for the Lord; be strong and take heart and wait for the Lord.

scripture.text: Wait for the Lord; be strong and take heart and wait for the Lord.

responses.response: If any of you lacks wisdom, you should ask God, who gives generously.

scripture.text: If any of you lacks wisdom, you should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to you.

responses.response: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
